verbose_text: Moreover, deletion of uvrA results in no additional reduction in bacterial survival following expression of darT G49D in strains lacking recF, ruvAB, ruvC, or recG (XREF_FIG C and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), providing genetic evidence that NER and RecFOR / RuvC operate in the same pathway to circumvent toxicity of DNA ADP ribosylation (XREF_FIG).
